keyword: how many calories in a drumstick ice cream
title: How Many Calories in a Drumstick Ice Cream?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a drumstick ice cream, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and simple tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Drumstick Ice Cream?
assumptions: Standard Nestlé Drumstick vanilla cone (≈70 g), with chocolate coating and peanuts; no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, flavor, size, and exact ingredients. Check product labels for precise values.

quick_answer.text: A standard Drumstick ice cream cone contains about 270 kcal.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in one Drumstick ice cream?
faqs.a: Approximately 270 kcal for a standard vanilla cone.

faqs.q: What are the carbs and sugars in a Drumstick ice cream?
faqs.a: About 35 g total carbs and 22 g sugars per cone.

faqs.q: Is there protein in Drumstick ice cream?
faqs.a: Roughly 4 g protein per cone, mostly from the milk base.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a Drumstick ice cream cone?
faqs.a: Around 14 g total fat, with 8 g saturated, from the coating and cream.

faqs.q: Does Drumstick ice cream have trans fats?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fats in standard varieties.
